mapper.sql: cid, receiptCode, orderNo, error, pieceAmount, specifications, goodsValue
mapper.select: SELECT r.cid,f.receiptCode,o.orderNo,r.error,r.pieceAmount,r.specifications,r.goodsValue FROM goods_receipt r,freightreceipt f,`order` o
mapper.insert: insert into goods_receipt (cid, receiptCode, orderNo, error, pieceAmount, specifications, goodsValue) values (#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{error,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pieceamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into goods_receipt
cid,
receiptCode,
orderNo,
error,
pieceAmount,
specifications,
goodsValue,
#{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update goods_receipt
receiptCode = #{receiptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
error = #{error,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pieceAmount = #{pieceamount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodsValue = #{goodsvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods_receipt set receiptCode = #{receiptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderNo = #{orderno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error = #{error,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pieceAmount = #{pieceamount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, specifications = #{specifications,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsValue = #{goodsvalue,jdbcType=INTEGER} where cid = #{cid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
